SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.abstractEntities

Class Sensor

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.abstractEntities.Sensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject, Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumiditySensor, LightSensor, MoveSensor, SmokeSensor, TemperatureInsideSensor, TimeSensor, WindSensor
public abstract class Sensor extends Object implements Subject, Element
Abstract base class for sensors. Sensors observe the environment and generate events.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sensor

      public Sensor(String name, String model, Room room)
      Constructs a sensor associated with a room.
      Parameters:
      name - sensor name
      model - sensor model
      room - room location

    • Sensor

      public Sensor(String name, String model)
      Constructs a sensor without an initial room assignment.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the sensor.
      model - The model identifier of the sensor.

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public void attach(Observer observer)
      Attaches an observer to this subject. The observer will be notified of future events generated by this sensor.
      Specified by:
      attach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to attach.

    • detach

      public void detach(Observer observer)
      Detaches an observer from this subject. The observer will no longer receive notifications from this sensor.
      Specified by:
      detach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to detach.

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers(Event event)
      Notifies all attached observers about a specific event.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      event - The event that occurred.

    • generateEvent

      public abstract void generateEvent()
      Abstract method to generate a specific event based on the sensor's logic.

    • findApplianceInCurrentRoom

      protected Optional<HouseholdItem> findApplianceInCurrentRoom(Class<? extends HouseholdItem> applianceType)
      Helper method to find a specific type of appliance in the sensor's current room. Used for sensors that need to trigger actions on specific devices (e.g., blinds).
      Parameters:
      applianceType - The class type of the appliance to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the appliance if found, or empty if not found or if the room is null.

    • accept

      public void accept(HouseConfigVisitorInterface visitor)
      Accepts a visitor for house configuration processing.
      Specified by:
      accept in interface Element
      Parameters:
      visitor - The visitor handling house configuration.

    • accept

      public void accept(ConsumptionVisitorInterface visitor)
      Accepts a visitor for consumption calculation. Sensors have negligible consumption in this simulation.
      Specified by:
      accept in interface Element
      Parameters:
      visitor - The visitor handling consumption logic.

    • accept

      public void accept(EventVisitorInterface visitor)
      Accepts a visitor for event processing.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      visitor - The visitor handling event logic.
